name: Egyptian Pyramids VR Roller Coaster
description:
Welcome to Egyptian Pyramids Virtual Reality Roller Coaster - the most exciting VR experience ever! Take a ride on the fastest and most fun roller coaster and enjoy a virtual reality thrill like never before! Have fun!

Visit the Pyramids and the Sphinx in a new and unique way : riding a fast roller coaster between Egyptian historical remains. All in Virtual Reality!

A game developed and published the SS Game Company
